body:
What are the guidelines for Mods, Srs and Admins joining scrim servers without permission?

Ps; Moderators, don't comment I just want a confirmation from a Sr, or Admin not like 5 replies from some mods.
body_tagged:

Ps; Moderators, don't comment I just want a confirmation from a Sr, or Admin not like 5 replies from some mods.
title: Question for Sr's or Admins.

replies.body:
Ik you didn't want my reply but

MapDevs can't just join scrim servers

replies.body: Dank seniors are allowed to check out dank hackers
replies.body_tagged: Dank seniors are allowed to check out dank hackers

replies.body: As of now, only Senior Moderators, Developers, and Administrators are allowed to enter scrimmage servers without the consent of a leader. A team leader can ask the staff member to leave if they desire, but if foul play/questionable acts are being reported, said staff member(s) will return and look into the issue without question.
replies.body_tagged: As of now, only Senior Moderators, Developers, and Administrators are allowed to enter scrimmage servers without the consent of a leader. A team leader can ask the staff member to leave if they desire, but if foul play/questionable acts are being reported, said staff member(s) will return and look into the issue without question.

replies.body: Okay, thanks for the reply. You can lock this now.
replies.body_tagged: Okay, thanks for the reply. You can lock this now.
